name: Psykiedellia
description:
Yume Edeia wakes up in a mysterious cave after a coma. Gifted with mysterious powers he must recover all fragments of his soul to be able to wake up from this nightmare. Will he succeed or sucumbs to the many dangers that await him ? Psykiedellia is a short 2D plateformer made during my first year at IIM.

Controls :

Directional Arrows -> Move

Space Bar -> Jump

M -> Attack
